copy.tagline: Experience the wonder and magic of Tinker Bell's world when you create your very own Fairy and take flight into Pixie Hollow for high-flying fun and endless excitement! Parents can join in with our Arrival Day Kit.
copy.colset1body: Fly into Pixie Hollow and experience life as a Fairy. Explore the meadows - the place to meet other Fairies for chatting and making tons of Fairy friends.
copy.colset2body: Create and customize your own Fairy or Sparrow Man - from wings to toes! Dress in the latest fashion and decorate your home with stylish furniture and delightful decorations.
copy.colset3body: Play magical talent games. Help fish swim upstream with the water-talent Fairies or light up the fireflies with the light-talent Fairies.
copy.colset4body: Find and collect tons of curious things like flowers and leaves to help change the seasons. Complete fun Fairy tasks and earn special badges to showcase in your Leaf Journal.
